channel.title: Lua on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Lua on Arrans github.io

item.title: luau-lang/luau
item.description: A small, fast, and embeddable programming language based on Lua with a gradual type system.

item.title: silverbulletmd/silverbullet
item.description: An open source personal productivity platform built on Markdown, turbo charged with the scripting power of Lua

item.title: xyproto/algernon
item.description: Small self-contained pure-Go web server with Lua, Teal, Markdown, Ollama, HTTP/2, QUIC, Redis, SQLite and PostgreSQL support ++

item.title: frol/completely-unscientific-benchmarks
item.description: Naive performance comparison of a few programming languages (JavaScript, Kotlin, Rust, Swift, Nim, Python, Go, Haskell, D, C++, Java, C#, Object Pascal, Ada, Lua, Ruby)
